en.title: Cat Litter Box Training: How to Teach Without Failure and Handle Accidents
en.content:
Cats have a natural instinct to eliminate on sand, making litter box training relatively easy. By following a few key points, you can achieve success quickly.

Basic Training Method

Place the kitten in the litter box and show them the digging motion with their front paws. Taking them to the litter box after meals, naps, and play sessions increases the success rate. Praise them when they succeed. It is important not to scold them for accidents.

Causes of Accidents

Common causes include a dirty litter box, an undesirable litter box location, unsuitable cat litter, stress, and urinary tract diseases. Start by reviewing the litter box environment, and if there is no improvement, consult a veterinarian.

Fuluck Cattery's Approach

At Fuluck Cattery, all kittens are litter box trained before being handed over. You can feel confident from the very first day your kitten comes home.

zh.title: 猫咪如厕训练：不失败的教学方法与随地排泄的对策
zh.content:
猫咪天生有在沙子上排泄的习性，因此如厕训练相对简单。掌握要点就能快速成功。

基本训练方法

将幼猫放入猫砂盆，示范用前爪刨砂的动作。在进食后、睡醒后、玩耍后带它去猫砂盆，可以提高成功率。成功后要表扬它。失败了也不要责骂，这一点非常重要。

随地排泄的原因

可能的原因包括猫砂盆不干净、猫砂盆位置不理想、猫砂不合适、压力以及泌尿系统疾病等。首先从改善猫砂盆环境开始，如果没有改善，请咨询兽医。

福楽猫舍的做法

福楽猫舍会在交付前完成所有幼猫的如厕训练。从领养第一天起就可以安心。
